name: Android
description: Supports the development of Android applications with IntelliJ IDEA and Android Studio.
notes:
This release contains updates from Android Studio Hedgehog Stable.

  For detailed information, please refer to the release notes available at: [Android Studio Hedgehog 2023.11](https://androidstudio.googleblog.com/2023/11/android-studio-hedgehog-202311-now.html)
